statements: UPDATE SocialMediaSentiments SET sentiment_score = 4.5, post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SocialMediaSentiments SET post_date = '2022-10-15 12:00:00', author_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' WHERE post_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SocialMediaSentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.9, post_date = '2022-01-25 14:30:00' WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE SocialMediaSentiments SET post_content = 'Updated post content', author_id = '654e3210-10b8-49a1-a543-234617492167' WHERE post_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-789012345678';
UPDATE sentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tweets SET tweet_text = 'Updated tweet text' WHERE tweet_id = 10;
UPDATE sentiments SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_category = 'Positive' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tweets SET created_at = '2022-10-15 09:00:00', tweet_text = 'Great day today!' WHERE tweet_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 500 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_likes = 1000, post_comments = 500 WHERE post_id = 98765;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 100, following_count = 50 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_likes = post_likes + 1, post_comments = post_comments - 2 WHERE post_id = 201;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = '456e7890-e12b-45a6-bcde-f4709a012345';
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE comments SET comment_text='Updated comment' WHERE comment_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE brand_users SET followers_count = 500 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE brand_products SET price = 19.99 WHERE product_name = 'iPhone';
UPDATE brand_users SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE brand_products SET price = 99.99, release_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE product_name = 'new_product_name';
